title: Dash
content:
speed. 1 turn Type: Action

Dash Tips & Notes

Rogues gain access to Bonus Action Cunning Action: Dash at Level 2. Eagle Heart Wildheart Barbarian gain access to Bonus Action Dash at Level 3. Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Arcane Trickster and Eldritch Knight gain access to Bonus Action Dash via the Level 1 Spell Expeditious Retreat. Enemies can also use Dash, some as a Bonus Action.

All Actions in Baldur's Gate 3 Aberrant Shape ♦ Abjure Enemy ♦ Absolute Power ♦ Absorb Elements (Reaction) ♦ Absorb
